SEARCH
Package BlockchainComponents

Class MiningNode

java.lang.Object
BlockchainComponents.BlockchainComponent
BlockchainComponents.Node
BlockchainComponents.MiningNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConnectable
public class MiningNode extends Node
This is the MiningNode class that extends the Node class. It represents a mining node in a blockchain.

    • nodeMine

      protected void nodeMine(Transaction transaction)
      Mines a block with a transaction. If the MiningNode doesn't have a mining method, it stops. Otherwise, it mines a block and broadcasts a ValidateBlockRq to the network.
      Overrides:
      nodeMine in class Node
      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction to mine.

    • nodeValidateBlock

      protected void nodeValidateBlock(ValidateBlockRq validateBlockRq)
      Validates a block. If the MiningNode is the one that created the block, it does nothing. If the MiningNode doesn't have a validation method, it stops. Otherwise, it validates the block and broadcasts a ValidateBlockRes to the network.
      Overrides:
      nodeValidateBlock in class Node
      Parameters:
      validateBlockRq - The ValidateBlockRq to validate.

    • fullName

      public String fullName()
      Returns a string representation of the MiningNode. The string contains "MiningNode#" and the formatted ID of the MiningNode.
      Overrides:
      fullName in class Node
      Returns:
      A string representation of the MiningNode.
